Package index

Main functions

periodogram_smooth()
Kernel spectral estimator of a multivatiate (multitype) point pattern
select_band()
Bandwidth selection procedure for kernel spectral estimator
coherence()
Maximum coherence and partial coherence matrix

Plot functions

plot_coher()
Plot coherence and partial coherence
plot_pairs()
Plot all possible spectral density estimates
plot_period()
Plot individual spectral density estimate

Ancillary functions

bartlett_uni()
Scaled Battlett kernel (univariate)
CohByFreq()
Compute (partial) coherence for a given frequency
fixpd_fun()
Fix the positive definite issue for a matrix
generate_cate()
Generate all pairwise combinations of mark
generate_freq()
Frequency grid generator
H.h.lambda.1()
Compute H.h.lambda.1 in the centered DFT
Hmatrix()
Compute the H matrix used in coherence.R
IRspec()
Compute the spectrum of the intensity reweighted process
periodogram()
Periodogram of a univatiate point pattern
scale2unitarea()
Recale the rectangular image to unit square
smoother()
Smooth an element from a matrix by averaging its neighbors
taper()
Univariate data taper
